attributes.name: CfContentComponent
attributes.description:
Component to render a form with navigation.

This component can either be used the default way:

{{cf-content documentId="some-id"}}

Or it can be customized

{{#cf-content documentId="some-id" as |content|}}
  <div uk-grid>
    <div class="uk-width-1-2">{{content.navigation}}</div>
    <div class="uk-width-1-2">
      {{content.form}}</div>
      <hr>
      {{content.pagination}}
    </div>
  </div>
{{/cf-content}}

arguments.name: documentId
arguments.description: The uuid of the document to display

arguments.name: context
arguments.description: Can be used to pass "context" information from the outside through to custom overrides.

arguments.name: disabled
arguments.description: Whether the form renders in disabled state

attributes.name: CfFieldComponent
attributes.description:
Component to display a label and input for a certain field of a document.

{{cf-field field=someField}}

You can disable the field by passing disabled=true.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Task to save a field. This will set the passed value to the answer and save the field to the API after a timeout off 500 milliseconds.

attributes.name: CfFieldInputComponent
attributes.description: Component for wrapping the input components

accessors.description: The input component type

attributes.name: CfFieldInputCheckboxComponent
attributes.description: Input component for the checkbox question type

methods.name: update
methods.description: Update the value of the field with the slugs of the currently checked boxes.

functions.name: getSlug
functions.description:
Function to extract the option slug out of an input element. This is needed since IE11 does not properly set the value attribute but sets the value to on if checked and off if not. So for all sane browsers we use the value attribute but for IE11 we use the appended option slug to the field id as the input elements name property.

E.g: An element with name="Document:xxx-xxx:Question:some-question:Option:some-option" will return some-option.

For further information about this bug see https://github.com/emberjs/ember.js/issues/15203

attributes.name: CfFieldInputFloatComponent
attributes.description: Input component for the float question type

methods.name: _uploadFile
methods.description: Promise wrapper around XHMLHttpRequest

returns.description: A promise resolving or rejecting with the event.

attributes.name: CfFieldInputIntegerComponent
attributes.description: Input component for the integer question type

attributes.name: CfFieldInputPowerSelectComponent
attributes.description: Dropdown component for the single and multiple choice question type

attributes.name: CfFieldInputRadioComponent
attributes.description: Input component for the radio question type

attributes.name: CfFieldInputTextComponent
attributes.description: Input component for the static question type

attributes.name: CfFieldInputTextComponent
attributes.description: Input component for the text question type

attributes.name: CfFieldInputTextareaComponent
attributes.description: Input component for the textarea question type

attributes.name: CfFormComponent
attributes.description:
Component to display a form for a whole document.

{{cf-form document=document}}

arguments.name: disabled
arguments.description: Allows the whole form to be disabled.

arguments.name: overrides
arguments.description:
A hash containg mappings for widget overrides. Set the key of the hash to the slug of the question and the value to the Ember component.

{{cf-form
  document=document
  overrides=(hash foo=(component "bar"))
}}

arguments.name: overrides
arguments.description: Can be used to pass "context" information from the outside through to custom overrides.

functions.name: getWidget
functions.description:
Helper for getting the right widget for a field.

This helper expects a field as first positional parameter. It checks if the field has a widget override in it's metadata. If one exists it checks if said widget was registered in the caluma options service and then returns the widget name.

{{component (get-widget field default="cf-form") foo=bar}}

attributes.name: Answer
attributes.description: Object which represents an answer in context of a field

accessors.description: The uuid of the answer
The name of the property in which the value is stored. This depends on the type of the answer.
The value of the answer, the type of this value depends on the type of the answer. For table answers this returns an array of documents.
The value serialized for a backend request.

attributes.name: Document
attributes.description: Object which represents a document

accessors.description: The uuid of the document
The root form of this document
The fieldsets of this document
All fields of all fieldsets of this document
The JEXL object for evaluating jexl expressions on this document
The JEXL context object for passing to the evaluation of jexl expessions

attributes.name: Field
attributes.description: An object which represents a combination of a question and an answer.

fields.name: hidden
fields.description:
The field's hidden state

A question is hidden if:

  • The form question field of the fieldset is hidden
  • All depending field (used in the expression) are hidden
  • The evaluated question.isHidden expression returns true

fields.name: optional
fields.description:
The field's optional state

The field is optional if:

  • The form question field of the fieldset is hidden
  • All depending field (used in the expression) are hidden
  • The evaluated question.isRequired expression returns false

methods.name: save.perform
methods.description: Task to save a field. This uses a different mutation for every answer type.

methods.name: validate.perform
methods.description: Validate the field. Every field goes through the required validation and the validation for the given question type. This mutates the errors on the field.

methods.name: _validateRequired
methods.description: Method to validate if a question is required or not.

returns.description: Returns an promise which resolves into an object if invalid or true if valid

methods.name: _validateTextQuestion
methods.description: Method to validate a text question. This checks if the value longer than predefined by the question.

returns.description: Returns an object if invalid or true if valid

methods.name: _validateTextareaQuestion
methods.description: Method to validate a textarea question. This checks if the value longer than predefined by the question.

returns.description: Returns an object if invalid or true if valid

methods.name: _validateIntegerQuestion
methods.description: Method to validate an integer question. This checks if the value is bigger or less than the options provided by the question.

returns.description: Returns an object if invalid or true if valid

methods.name: _validateFloatQuestion
methods.description: Method to validate a float question. This checks if the value is bigger or less than the options provided by the question.

returns.description: Returns an object if invalid or true if valid

methods.name: _validateChoiceQuestion
methods.description: Method to validate a radio question. This checks if the value is included in the provided options of the question.

returns.description: Returns an object if invalid or true if valid

methods.name: _validateMultipleChoiceQuestion
methods.description: Method to validate a checkbox question. This checks if the all of the values are included in the provided options of the question.

returns.description: Returns per value an object if invalid or true if valid

methods.name: _validateChoiceQuestion
methods.description: Method to validate a radio question. This checks if the value is included in the provided options of the question.

returns.description: Returns an object if invalid or true if valid

methods.name: _validateMultipleChoiceQuestion
methods.description: Method to validate a checkbox question. This checks if the all of the values are included in the provided options of the question.

returns.description: Returns per value an object if invalid or true if valid

methods.name: _validateFileQuestion
methods.description: Dummy method for the validation of file uploads.

methods.name: _validateDateQuestion
methods.description: Method to validate a date question.

returns.description: Returns per value an object if invalid or true if valid

methods.name: _validateTableQuestion
methods.description: Dummy method for the validation of table fields

methods.name: _validateStaticQuestion
methods.description: Dummy method for the validation of static fields

methods.name: _validateFormQuestion
methods.description: Dummy method for the validation of form fields

accessors.description: The question to this field
The answer to this field. It is possible for this to be null if the question is of the static question type.
Whether the field is valid.
Whether the field is invalid.
Whether the field is new (never saved to the backend service)
The type of the question
The document this field belongs to
The value of the field

Fields that are referenced in the isHidden JEXL expression

If the value or hidden state of any of these fields change, the JEXL expression needs to be re-evaluated.

Fields that are referenced in the isRequired JEXL expression

If the value or hidden state of any of these fields change, the JEXL expression needs to be re-evaluated.
The error messages on this field.

attributes.name: Fieldset
attributes.description: Object that represents a combination of a document and a form

accessors.description: The field for this fieldset. A fieldset has a field if there is a form question pointing to the fieldsets form in the document.
The form for this fieldset
The fields in this fieldset

attributes.name: Form
attributes.description: Object that represents a blueprint form

attributes.name: NavigationItem
attributes.description: Object to represent a navigation state for a certain fieldset.

fields.name: fieldset
fields.description: The fieldset to build the navigation item for

fields.name: active
fields.description: The item is active if the query param displayedForm is equal to the slug of the item.

fields.name: navigable
fields.description: The item is navigable if it is not hidden and its fieldset contains at least one question that is not a form question and is not hidden.

fields.name: visible
fields.description: The item is visible if it is navigable or at least one of its children is navigable.

accessors.description: The parent navigation item
The children of this navigation item
The label displayed in the navigation
The slug of the items form
The slug of the parent items form

The current state consisting of the items and the childrens fieldset state.

This can be one of 4 states:

  • untouched if every fieldset is untouched
  • invalid if any fieldset is invalid
  • valid if every fieldset is valid
  • unfinished if there are valid and untouched fieldsets

The current state of the item's fieldset. This does not consider the state of children items.

This can be one of 4 states:

  • untouched if every field is new
  • invalid if any field is invalid
  • valid if every field is valid
  • unfinished if there are valid and new fields

attributes.name: Navigation
attributes.description: Object to represent a navigation state for a certain document.

fields.name: document
fields.description: The document to build the navigation for

methods.name: preventNonNavigableItem
methods.description: Observer which transitions to the next navigable item if the current item is not navigable.

methods.name: goToNextItem
methods.description: Replace the current item with the next navigable item

accessors.description: The navigation items for the given document
The currently active navigation item
The next navigable item in the navigation tree
The previous navigable item in the navigation tree

attributes.name: Question
attributes.description: Object which represents a question in context of a field

attributes.name: CalumaOptionsService
attributes.description:
The options service is there to provide a means to share data between the host application and the addon at runtime.

The Power Select dropdown will be registered on initialization.

fields.name: _namespace
fields.description: The property where the namespace is stored.

methods.name: setNamespace
methods.description: Sets the namespace.

methods.name: getNamespace
methods.description: Writes a value to the store.

methods.name: registerComponentOverride
methods.description: Registers a new component override.

params.name: override.label
params.description: The text displayed in the form-builder dropdown.

params.name: override.component
params.description: The path/name of the overriding component.

methods.name: unregisterComponentOverride
methods.description: Unregisters a component override.

params.name: override
params.description: Either an override object (see register method) or a component path/name.

methods.name: getComponentOverrides
methods.description: Returns the registered overrides as an array.

params.name: tree
params.description: The JEXL AST tree or branch
